newsitem.title: PERU: Peru's G y M to issue $15 million in bonds this wk.
newsitem.headline: Peru's G y M to issue $15 million in bonds this wk.

text.p: Peruvian construction firm Grana y Montero Edificaciones SA will start a $15 million mortgage bond issue on the local market this week, a company executive said Monday.

"This week - probably Thursday - we will be issuing mortgage bonds that have already been authorized by the stocks and securities board (CONASEV)," the company's financial manager Javier Perez said in an interview.

The issue - the first by the company - will be made in three lots of 5,000 bonds. Each bond will have a nominal value of $1,000 and an effective annual interest rate of at least 10 percent, according to CONASEV.
The income raised from the issue will be used to help finance various construction projects, Perez said.
